item.description:
@runegay wrote:

there isnt, but when it says that they are a noob, i want them to start crying (hence the cry emote)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2008, 06:11:19 PM[/size][hr]i think i might need an apearence update[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2008, 06:15:01 PM[/size][hr]alright thanks everybody i got it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2008, 06:17:23 PM[/size][hr]wait but now it says that im a noob and my str is 135

item.title: Max hit code error

item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if(command.startsWith("max")) { sendMessage("Your max hit is "+playerMaxHit+""); if (playerLevel[2] >= 80) { sendMessage("wow, thats pretty high!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("Hey everybody! "+playerName+"'s max hit is "+playerMaxHit+"! Thats good!"); } else if (playerLevel[2] <=80) sendMessage("your max hit sucks! your a noob!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("Hey everybody! "+playerName+"'s max hit is "+playerMaxHit+"! He's a noob!!"); setAnimation(161); }

Use this.

item.title: Max hit code error
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

thanks to delta the max hit code works, but i want it to say things when they enter the code depending on their str level.and i want the cry emote to happen if there str level sucks. i have this:

if(command.startsWith("max"))
			{
sendMessage("Your max hit is "+playerMaxHit+"");
if (playerLevel[2] >= 80)
sendMessage("wow, thats pretty high!");
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("Hey everybody! "+playerName+"'s max hit is "+playerMaxHit+"! Thats good!");
else if
(playerLevel[2] <=80)
sendMessage("your max hit sucks! your a noob!");
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("Hey everybody! "+playerName+"'s max hit is "+playerMaxHit+"! He's a noob!!");
setAnimation(161);
}

and in my compiler i get this error

client.java:9267: 'else' without 'if'
else if
^
1 error
Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555
config\objects.cfg: file not found.

anyone know what’s wrong?

Read full topic
